>From: steven.hale@...

>Interesting to see that Joh=
n Goodsen (private method thread) is using
>Design By Contract in conjuncti=
on with unit testing and JUnit. Is anybody
>else is doing this and how they=

Test-Driven Development drives a programmer towards DBC on a test-by-te=
st
basis. As a result, although I don't use DBC tools, I believe I'm doing =
DBC

by simply writing the tests first. In a way, JUnit is my DBC tool.
